ModMetaData.name: RimUniverse - Core (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Balthoraz
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Balthorazs mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2257043629
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/RimUniverseCoreModule][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]
Expand your RimWorld into the next level with RimUniverse! This mod expands RimWorld using unique features and other community mods integrated together to bring you a new experience and easy management of them.
This a Core Module, used as framework for all next coming other modules. It also features some Quality of Life improvements.
You can enable/disable any submod in mod Settings.
[b]Submods list:[/B] Show Mod Designators by Erdelf
[h1]Contributions (Credits):[/h1] Erdelf - Show Mod Designators (Integrated)
[h1]RimUniverse modules[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2257048351][img]https://i.imgur.com/ezJYSHW.png[/img][/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
